text.autoconfig.chatcalc.title: Configure ChatCalc
text.autoconfig.chatcalc.option.decimalF:
This pattern determines the format in which calculated answers are presented
By default, one thousand will be represented as "1,000" with up to 2 decimal places
You may change this to remove or change the decimal separator (,) and the amount of decimal places
WARNING: Be cautious when changing this or it may have unruly consequences.

Examples -
0.## -> Will no longer include the decimal separator (,)
#,##0.#### -> Will display up to 4 decimal places of accuracy
0.00 -> Will always display 2 decimal places, even if they are 0

More information may be found here: https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/i18n/format/decimalFormat.html
